text: Sheikh Fazilatunnesa Mujib (; 8 August 1930 â€“ 15 August 1975), was the wife of Sheikh Mujibur Rahman, the founder and revolutionary leader of Bangladesh. She is considered the "Mother of the Nation". The current daughter of the Prime Minister of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1975 deaths Category:People from Gopalganj district, Bangladesh Category:First Ladies
title: Sheikh Fazilatunnesa Mujib
